"sealed abstract" is not necessary since "sealed" is enough. Marking a trait as "abstract" is somewhat confusing because a trait is abstract by definition.
"sealed abstract" is not necessary since "sealed" is enough. Marking a trait as "abstract" is somewhat confusing because a trait is abstract by definition.
